items.content_html: Trook is a lightweight trip booking web app that makes planning your next adventure quick and simple. With an intuitive interface, users can explore and book trips effortlessly. Built with scalability in mind, Trook focuses on delivering a seamless booking experience for travelers
items.title: Upendra-Jaiswal/Trook: Trook is a lightweight trip booking web app that makes planning your next adventure quick and simple. With an intuitive interface, users can explore and book trips effortlessly. Built with scalability in mind, Trook focuses on delivering a seamless booking experience for travelers

items.content_html: get-user-os is a lightweight, easy-to-use JavaScript library that provides a simple API to detect the operating system of a user. It's built with TypeScript and works seamlessly across different browsers
